summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3974 for the improvement of Woodlawn Avenue from Ravenna Boulevard to East 73rd Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by the installation of a street lighting system, under Ordinance No. 48382, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
